content: Kwik Tog HLD Economical plastic anchor for drywall ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features The wings spring out and adapt to all materials Allows flexibility when selecting screws Ribs on the body help prevent the anchor from spinning during installation Remains mounted in the wall without the screw for convenient handling, installation and re-use Unique, one-piece design for fast and easy installation Applications Fastening on low-strength materials with cavities - for use with standard wood screws Anchoring in perforated brick or block, drywall, concrete Static wall applications requiring light load performance ### TECHNICAL DATA: Environmental conditions: Indoor, damp conditions, Indoor, dry conditions, Outdoor Material composition: Polyamide Drill bit diameter: 10 mm Technical Data | Environmental conditions | Indoor, damp conditions, Indoor, dry conditions, Outdoor | Material composition | Polyamide | Type of fixing (global) | Through-fastening, Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 335506 - Drywall anchor KWIK TOG 2 (HLD 2) - Package Size 150 pc Package Contents: - 1x HLD 2 Light-duty anchor - 3001809 - Drywall anchor KWIK TOG 2 (HLD2) MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1800x HLD 2 Light-duty anchor - 335507 - Drywall anchor KWIK TOG 3 (HLD 3) - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HLD 3 Light-duty anchor - 3001810 - Drywall anchor KWIK TOG 3 (HLD3) MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1200x HLD 3 Light-duty anchor - 335508 - Drywall anchor KWIK TOG 4 (HLD 4) - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HLD 4 Light-duty anchor - 3001811 - Drywall anchor KWIK TOG 4 (HLD4) MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1200x HLD 4 Light-duty anchor
